trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_ERROR_DISABLE<tab>My apologies, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but we're not able to accept new clientele at present.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_ERROR_RETAINER_COUNT<tab>It does not appear you have any retainers in your employ at this time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_ERROR_RETAINER_CHARGE<tab>You cannot perform this action until you have purchased the services of an additional retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_DEFAULT_TALK_01<tab>Ah, <var 29 EB02 /var>. Welcome to Musica Universalis. How may I help you?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_REGISTER_TALK_01<tab>May I have the name of a retainer you wish to dispatch? The Crystal Exarch has asked that Feo Ul serve as their intermediary. How they would accomplish this, well... I thought it better not to ask.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_REGISTER_ASK<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to the Crystarium?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_REGISTER_SUCCESS<tab>Very good. I will see to it Feo Ul contact them right away.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_REGISTER_ALREADY<tab>I do believe that retainer has already been dispatched to the Crystarium.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_REGISTER_FAILED<tab>The retainer was unable to meet with Feo Ul.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_TITLE<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER<tab>Dispatch a retainer to the Crystarium.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_ABOUT<tab>Ask about the Crystarium market.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_CASHBACK<tab>View market tax rates.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_ABOUT_01<tab>The Crystarium's market is by no means large, but you're more than welcome to sell your wares here.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_MAIN_MENU_ABOUT_02<tab>The Crystal Exarch tells me Feo Ul has been charged with retrieving your things, from...where are you from again, exactly?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ASK_TITLE<tab>Current Market Tax Rates:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ASK<tab><var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var>: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ASK_NONE<tab><var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var>: Normal
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ASK_ABOUT<tab>Learn about Market Tax
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ASK_CANCEL<tab>Return
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_NO_CASHBACK<tab>Tax on items sold in the <var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var> markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E803 /var>%.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK<tab>Tax on items sold in the <var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var> markets is reduced to <var 20 E805 /var>% until <var 07 E803 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ABOUT_01<tab>To make their markets more attractive to prospective sellers, cities will often lower the percentage of tax that is collected from each sale.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERMARKETREGISTER_00581_CASHBACK_ABOUT_02<tab>Reduced tax rate periods can end earlier than indicated if areas require maintenance.
